Title: Host-Only Policy Enforcement
Description: No founder exposure; proxy agents for all public comms. ACCEPTANCE: All external materials list host only; Founder name absent from all public docs; Proxy email/phone configured; Review checklist for new materials.

Title: Threat Model Documentation
Description: Document doxxing, harassment, spear-phishing, deepfake risks. ACCEPTANCE: All threat vectors documented; Mitigations mapped per threat; Monitoring systems identified; Response procedures defined.

Title: Surface Minimization Audit
Description: Inventory and reduce public touchpoints. ACCEPTANCE: All public touchpoints inventoried; High-risk items removed/obfuscated; Separate domains/emails configured; Entity structure documented.

Title: Privacy Infrastructure Setup
Description: Separate domains, emails, PO boxes, entities. ACCEPTANCE: All infrastructure provisioned; Access controls configured; Documentation complete; Tested for leakage.

Title: NDA and Legal Document Suite
Description: NDAs, terms, privacy policy with counsel sign-off. ACCEPTANCE: All documents counsel-signed; Version control active; Distribution tracked; Enforcement runbooks written.

Title: Takedown Procedure Development
Description: Legal templates and rapid response workflows. ACCEPTANCE: Templates for major platforms; Response SLA defined; Evidence preservation process; Escalation contacts listed.

Title: Crisis Drill Execution
Description: Incident simulations with comms trees. ACCEPTANCE: At least 2 drills completed; Hotwash reports filed; Improvements logged; Retest scheduled.

Title: Brand Monitoring Automation
Description: Brand mentions, domain lookups, image/video flags. ACCEPTANCE: Monitoring tools configured; Alerts to designated channels; Auto-create incidents in Linear; Daily digest reports.
Parent: M22: Threat Model and Response Playbooks

Title: Access Proxying System
Description: Role-based keys with session recording. ACCEPTANCE: Proxied access for public-facing ops; Sessions recorded and stored; Revocation scripts tested; Audit log complete.

Title: Legal Template Injector
Description: Pre-approved responses and takedown sequences. ACCEPTANCE: Response library complete; Templates version controlled; Preservation workflow integrated; One-click deployment tested.
